mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXHIBITION (EXH_TITLE, EXH_PRICE, EXH_ST_DATE, EXH_END_DATE, EXH_RGE_DATE, EXH_LOCATION, EXH_HALL, EXH_CONTENT, EXH_THUMBNAIL, EXH_BANNE, EXH_IMG , EXH_PLANNER, EXH_TIME, EXH_RATING, EXH_ARTIST, EXH_PLACE_X, EXH_PLACE_Y, EXH_LOCAL_NAME, EXH_CS_PHONE, EXH_FEE, EXH_SHIPPING_INFO, EXH_PERIOD_USE, EXH_REFUND_INFO) VALUES ( #{exh_title}, #{exh_price}, #{exh_st_date}, #{exh_end_date}, now(), #{exh_location}, #{exh_hall}, #{exh_content}, #{exh_thumbnail}, #{exh_banne}, #{exh_img}, #{exh_planner}, #{exh_time}, #{exh_rating}, #{exh_artist}, #{exh_place_x}, #{exh_place_y}, #{exh_local_name}, #{exh_cs_phone}, #{exh_fee}, #{exh_shipping_info}, #{exh_period_use}, #{exh_refund_info})
mapper.update: UPDATE EXHIBITION SET EXH_TITLE=#{exh_title}, EXH_PRICE=#{exh_price}, EXH_ST_DATE=#{exh_st_date}, EXH_END_DATE=#{exh_end_date}, EXH_MDF_DATE=now(), EXH_LOCATION=#{exh_location}, EXH_HALL=#{exh_hall}, EXH_CONTENT =#{exh_content}, EXH_THUMBNAIL=#{exh_thumbnail}, EXH_BANNE=#{exh_banne}, EXH_IMG=#{exh_img}, EXH_PLANNER=#{exh_planner}, EXH_TIME=#{exh_time}, EXH_RATING=#{exh_rating}, EXH_ARTIST=#{exh_artist}, EXH_LOCAL_NAME=#{exh_local_name}, EXH_APPROVAL=#{exh_approval} WHERE EXH_NO=#{exh_no}
UPDATE EXHIBITION SET EXH_APPROVAL=1 WHERE EXH_NO=#{exh_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EXHIBITION WHERE 1=1 AND UPPER(EXH_TITLE) LIKE UPPER(REPLACE(CONCAT('%', #{exSearchKeyword},'%'),' ','')) ORDER BY EXH_NO DESC AND UPPER(EXH_HALL) LIKE UPPER(REPLACE(CONCAT('%', #{exSearchKeyword},'%'),' ','')) ORDER BY EXH_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXHIBITION WHERE 1=1 AND UPPER(EXH_TITLE) LIKE UPPER(REPLACE(CONCAT('%', #{exSearchKeyword},'%'),' ','')) AND UPPER(EXH_HALL) LIKE UPPER(REPLACE(CONCAT('%', #{exSearchKeyword},'%'),' ',''))
